mapper.select: SELECT BL_REPLY_NUM, POST_NUM, BL_REPLY_WRITER, BL_REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BL_REPLY_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS BL_REPLY_DATE, NVL(PARENT_BL_REPLY_NUM,BL_REPLY_NUM) AS PARENT_BL_REPLY_NUM, BL_REPLY_DEL_YN FROM TB_BLOG_REPLY WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum} ORDER BY PARENT_BL_REPLY_NUM ASC,BL_REPLY_NUM ASC
mapper.insert:
